title: Exponential Decay - Wind Turbines - Part C

content.question: Part C Use the model <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mn>S</mn> </math> to find the value of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mn>m</mn> </math> such that the noise level is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mn>20</mn> </math> decibels at a distance of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mn>m</mn> </math> meters from the turbine.

frqParts.text: Part C Use the model <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mn>S</mn> </math> to find the value of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mn>m</mn> </math> such that the noise level is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mn>20</mn> </math> decibels at a distance of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mn>m</mn> </math> meters from the turbine.

topic.text: 2.5: Exponential Function Context and Data Modeling

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
